origin.vibe-origins.turtle.name: Turtalian
origin.vibe-origins.turtle.description: A semi-aquatic origin with high defensive capabilities, restricting movement.
origin.vibe-origins.marc.name: M.A.R.C
origin.vibe-origins.marc.description: Artificial intelligence with an unknown inventor. Completely humanoid but prone to bugs.

power.vibe-origins.faster_swim.descripti: You can swim faster than humans.
power.vibe-origins.turtling.name: Unflippable
power.vibe-origins.turtling.description: You do not take knockback from most sources.
power.vibe-origins.wb_effect.name: Amphibious
power.vibe-origins.slow_movement.name: Heavy-shelled
power.vibe-origins.slow_movement.descrip: You always move 80% slower on land.
power.vibe-origins.slow_attacks.name: Slow-armed
power.vibe-origins.no_recursion.name: Cubone Repellant
power.vibe-origins.no_recursion.descript: You can not use turtle shelmets.
power.vibe-origins.better_kelp.name: Aquatic Vegetarian
power.vibe-origins.better_kelp.descripti: Dried kelp gives 3x as much saturation.
power.vibe-origins.heavyweight.name: Heavyweight
power.vibe-origins.heavyweight.descripti: You can only jump half as high.
power.vibe-origins.turbo_boost.name: Power Jump
power.vibe-origins.turbo_boost.descripti: You can launch in the air every few seconds.

power.vibe-origins.needs_repair.descript: Get slowness and weakness when falling below 3 hearts.
power.vibe-origins.short_circuiting.name: Short Circuiting
power.vibe-origins.short_circuiting.desc: Take damage while in cold biomes.
power.vibe-origins.recharge.name: Charger
power.vibe-origins.recharge.description: You can regenerate hunger while standing on redstone blocks.
power.vibe-origins.prevent_food.name: Electric
power.vibe-origins.prevent_food.descript: You cannot eat any normal foods.
power.vibe-origins.edible_coal.name: Pica
power.vibe-origins.edible_coal.descripti: You can eat assorted foods with the second ability key.
power.vibe-origins.boxed_like_a_jellyfis: Your hits deal 2 seconds of poison.
